title: Vintage Belt Buckle Water Bottle Belt Clip Holder Western cowboy belt buckle Portable Metal Belt Cup Holder
features: Metal Belt Buckle Beer Holder: Open the cowboy belt buckles for men and place beer bottles, cocktail bottles and coke cans, so you can be hands free! High degree of adaptation, you can just use any belt you already have at home.

Easy to Open and Close: It's a belt buckle can holder, you can simply flip the buckle to open and close it, there is a hoop pops up automatically when opened, you can place the beer on it any time or wear it as a fashion accessory.

Practicality: If it really is a fun party, you can expect yourself to move around much and it is such a hassle to keep holding a beer in your hand. The beer holder belt buckle can hold drinks fit in a 70 mm-diameter!
High Quality: The beer belt holder is made of durable and strong high-quality zinc alloy metal. So it can effectively support the weight of the drink and it can maintain its shape at 90 degrees.
Fitted Size: This belt buckle cup holder measures approximately 10.3*8cm which can fit standard 1.5" belts and weight about 240g.
description: The main purpose of this metal belt buckle is that it holds the bottle or can in place without the need for you to use your hands. This is especially true if you don’t plan to consume it right away or have something do while you drink such as cooking. As long as you have this beer belt buckle, you can carry your drink with you conveniently. Specification: Material: Zinc Alloy Size: 10.3x8 cm Weight: 240 g Packing List: Metal Belt Buckle* 1
